description: Frequent heavy rainfall and deforestation have made the slopes in Barangay Damilag vulnerable to landslides, especially during the rainy season.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Narra - Known for its strong and deep roots, which help in stabilizing soil.

description: The steep terrain and poorly compacted soil in Barangay Alae, combined with water run-off from nearby hills, contribute to frequent landslides in this area.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Bamboo - Fast-growing and excellent for preventing soil erosion on steep slopes.

description: Known for its loose soil and proximity to a fault line, Barangay Dicklum experiences landslides after even moderate seismic activity or heavy rain.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Mahogany - A large tree with a deep root system that can strengthen loose soil.

description: The area's natural drainage system is insufficient to handle large volumes of water during typhoons, leading to erosion and occasional landslides.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Vetiver Grass - Ideal for stabilizing soil due to its extensive root system that can grow vertically into the ground.

description: Frequent soil erosion along the steep inclines of Barangay Lunocan has caused landslides, particularly near roadways and agricultural areas.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Acacia - This tree is great for erosion control and has a spreading root system to stabilize slopes.

description: Deforestation and land-use changes for farming have weakened the soil structure in Barangay Lingating, increasing the risk of landslides.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Ipil-Ipil - A nitrogen-fixing plant that helps restore soil quality and reduces erosion.

description: Kalugmanan's high slopes combined with logging activities have destabilized the ground, making the area prone to landslides during the rainy season.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Molave - A durable tree species with strong roots ideal for rehabilitating degraded areas.

description: The combination of loose sedimentary rock and poor water drainage has led to frequent landslides in Barangay Santiago, especially near riverbanks.
seedling_suggestion: Suggested Seedling: Mangrove Trees - Suitable for riverbanks, these trees stabilize soil and reduce erosion caused by water runoff.
